# Commit Template

Format: `[category]: [subject] ([id])`

## Categories
- `add`: New features or files.
- `fix`: Bug fixes.
- `improve`: Refactors, performance, or styling.
- `ops`: Build, CI, or internal documentation.
- `qa`: Tests and quality gate adjustments.

## Structure
```text
{{CATEGORY}}: {{TITLE}} ({{ID}})

- Bulleted list of material changes
- Why the change was made (intent)
- Any breaking changes or migrations
```
